to.info: Traded Robyn Regehr to Kings for 2014 second round pick (#60-Alex Lintuniemi), 2015 second round pick on 2013-04-01

from.info: Traded Nicolas Deslauriers, Hudson Fasching to Sabres for Brayden McNabb, Jonathan Parker, 2014 second round pick (#60-Alex Lintuniemi), 2015 second round pick on 2014-03-05
Traded rights to Jonathan Bernier to Maple Leafs for Ben Scrivens, Matt Frattin, 2014 or 2015 (Maple Leafs option) second round pick on 2013-06-23

to.info: Traded Marian Gaborik to Kings for Matt Frattin, 2014 or 2015 (Ducks option from prior trade) second round pick, 2014 conditional third round pick (if Kings advance to second round of 2014 playoffs) (#63-Dominic Turgeon) on 2014-03-05
Traded Daniel Carcillo to Kings for 2015 conditional round pick (fifth round if Carcillo plays 40 or more games with the Kings in the 2013-14 season, else sixth round) on 2013-07-16

from.info: Traded 2013 seventh round pick (#208-Anthony Brodeur) to Devils for 2015 seventh round pick on 2013-06-30

to.info: Traded Andrej Sekera to Kings for Roland McKeown, conditional first round pick (in 2015 if Kings qualify for 2015 playoff, else 2016) on 2015-02-25
Traded James Livingston to Kings for 2016 conditional seventh round pick on 2014-03-05 (Conditions on pick are unconfirmed.)
